attributes.action: Sack Bruce Forsyth from 'Strictly Come Dancing'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we have to put up with Forsyth who is embarrassingly out of his depth with autocue and live television? He adds nothing to the show and demonstrates every week that he should have retired 20 years ago (with the same catchphrase!). He can't be accused of overworking scriptwriters.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
